entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -4.5°C

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:44 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow becoming mixed with periods of rain in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning and early in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm except 5 cm over northern sections. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:44 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Snow at times mixed with rain early in the evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:44 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022
